item.title: I cant get further
item.dc:creator: @_BBLLAARRGGHH __--BBLLAARRGGHH--__
item.description:
@_BBLLAARRGGHH wrote:

[quote=“imsokool22, post:13, topic:316174”]can i ask what does packaged mean?
sorry i really dont know that word because i never saw it used and no one ever told me the meaning[/quote]Well a normal server when you open the folder, you see all the files there, but packaged has a folder for the java files, and a folder for class files. Then inside those there are more folders like io(input/output), player, npc etc. It’s much more organised now, but the files look slightly different, and all commands are in commands.java.

Read full topic

item.title: I cant get further
item.dc:creator: @Tehh Tehh
item.description:
@Tehh wrote:

In client.java press ctrl and f then search for this:

private void customCommand(String command) {

Look under that for the commands you cannot find, if only players is there you’ll need to add the commands yourself.

Another alternative could be you made your self an administrator not an admin, change the player rights to 3 if so

Read full topic

item.title: I cant get further
item.dc:creator: @Meryntje Meryntje
item.description:
@Meryntje wrote:

Im using Impact source from Ian
And i made myself admin but almost no command works…

Master/Pickup alot commands…

Only player worked

Can some one plz help me?

[code]package server.players.packets;

import server.util.;
import server.;
import server.players.;
import java.text.DateFormat;
import java.text.;
import java.util.*;

/**

  • Commands
    **/
    public class Commands implements PacketType {

     @Override 
 public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
 String playerCommand = c.getInStream().readString();
 	if (c.playerRights >= 0) {
 	
 		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("players")) {
 			c.sendMessage("There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " players!");
 			/*c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Impact - Online Players", 8144);
 			c.ClearQuestInterface();
 			c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dbl@Online players(" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()
 					+ "):", 8145);
 			int line = 8146;
 			for (int i = 1; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
 				Client playa = c.getClient(i);
 				if (!c.validClient(i))
 					continue;
 				if (playa.playerName != null) {
 					String title = "";
 					String level = ""+playa.combatLevel;
 					c.getPA().sendFrame126(title+""+ playa.playerName +" - Level: " + level, line);
 					line++;
 				}
 			}
 			c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
 			c.flushOutStream();*/
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) {
 			String yell = playerCommand.substring(5);
 			c.getPA().yell(yell);
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("pass")) {
 			c.playerPass = playerCommand.substring(5);
 			c.sendMessage("Your new pass is '" + playerCommand.substring(5) + "'");
 		}
 	
 	}
 	
 	if (c.playerRights > 0) {
 	
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("modyell")) {
 			String yell = playerCommand.substring(8);
 			c.getPA().modYell(yell);
 		}
 	
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteletome")) {
 			try {
 				String otherPName = playerCommand.substring(10);
 				int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
 				if (otherPIndex != -1) {
 					Client p = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
 					p.teleportToX = c.getX();
 					p.teleportToY = c.getY();
 					p.heightLevel = c.heightLevel;
 					c.sendMessage("You have teleported "+p.playerName+" to you.");
 					p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+ c.playerName);
 					c.updateRequired = true; 
 					c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
 					p.updateRequired = true;
 					p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
 				} else {
 					c.sendMessage("The name doesnt exist.");
 				}
 			} catch (Exception e) {
 				c.sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to you.");
 			}
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("empty")) {
 			c.getItems().removeAllItems();
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("kick")) {
 			try {
 				String kicked = playerCommand.substring(5);
 				int kick = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(kicked);
 				if (kick != -1) {
 					Client p = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[kick];
 					c.sendMessage("You have successfully kicked "+kicked+".");
 					p.disconnected = true;
 					c.updateRequired = true;
 					c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
 				} else {
 					c.sendMessage("The name you have tried to kick, does not exist or is not online.");
 				}
 			} catch(Exception e) {
 				c.sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to kick.");
 			}
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("mute")) {
 			try {
 				String muted = playerCommand.substring(5);
 				int mute = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(muted);
 				Client p = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[mute];
 				if (mute != 0) {
 					Client v = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[mute];
 					c.sendMessage("You successfully muted "+muted+".");
 					c.writeLog(v.playerName, "Muted");
 					c.writeLog(c.playerName+" muted "+v.playerName, "MuteLog");
 					p.muted = 1;
 					p.sendMessage(""+c.playerName+" has muted you for breaking a rule.");
 					p.updateRequired = true; 
 					p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
 				} else {
 					c.sendMessage("The player you have tried to mute isn't online, or doesn't excist.");
 				}
 			} catch(Exception e) {
 				c.sendMessage("Try entering the name you want to mute.");
 			}
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteleto")) {
 			try {
 				String otherPName = playerCommand.substring(8);
 				int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
 				if (otherPIndex != -1) {
 					Client p = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
 					c.teleportToX = p.absX;
 					c.teleportToY = p.absY;
 					c.heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
 					c.updateRequired = true;
 					c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
 					p.updateRequired = true;
 					p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
 					c.sendMessage("You teleport to " + p.playerName);
 				}
 			} catch (Exception e) {
 				c.sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to..");
 			}
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("banuser")) {
 			try {
 				String victim = playerCommand.substring(8);
 				int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
 				Client v = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[index];
 				if (index != 0) {
 					c.writeLog(v.playerName, "Banned");
 					c.writeLog(c.playerName+" banned "+v.playerName+". | Date: "+ date +"; Time: "+ time +";", "BanLog");
 					v.disconnected = true;
 					c.sendMessage("You have sucessfully banned "+v.playerName+".");
 				} else {
 					c.sendMessage("The person you have tried to ban isn't online.");
 				}
 			} catch (Exception e) {
 				c.sendMessage("An error has occured while attempting to ban that player.");
 			}
 		}

 	}
 	
 	if (c.playerRights > 1) {
 	
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("cckick")) {
 			Client p2 = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerCommand.substring(7))];
 			if(c.clanName != "None" && c.clanLeader != "Nobody" && p2.clanName == c.clanName && p2.clanLeader == c.clanLeader && p2.playerName != c.clanLeader) {
 				p2.sendMessage("You have been kicked from your clan by "+c.playerName+".");
 				p2.removeFromCC();
 				for(int i=16502; i<=16532; i++) {
 					if(p2.clanMembers[i-16502] == p2.playerName) {
 						p2.clanMembers[i-16502] = null;
 						c.updateCCMenu();
 						break;
 					}
 				}
 				c.sendMessage(playerCommand.substring(7)+" has been kicked successfully.");
 			} else {
 				c.sendMessage("You can't kick yourself.");
 			}
 		}
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("ccleave")) {
 			if(c.clanName != "None" && c.clanLeader != c.playerName) {
 				c.sendMessage("You have left your clan.");
 				c.removeFromCC();
 			} else {
 				c.sendMessage("You can't leave your own clan.");
 			}
 		}
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("ccdelete")) {
 			if(c.clanName != "None" && c.clanLeader == c.playerName) {
 				c.removeFromCC();
 				c.getPA().sendFrame126("Talking in: @yel@None", 16006);
 				c.getPA().sendFrame126("Owner: @yel@Nobody", 16007);
 				for(int i=0; i<=16; i++) {
 					if(c.clanMembers[i] != null && c.clanMembers[i] != c.playerName) {
 						Client cm = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(c.clanMembers[i])];
 						cm.sendMessage("The clan you were in has been deleted.");
 						cm.getPA().sendFrame126("Talking in: @yel@None", 16006);
 						cm.getPA().sendFrame126("Owner: @yel@Nobody", 16007);
 						cm.removeFromCC();
 					}
 				}
 				c.sendMessage("You have deleted your clan.");
 			} else {
 				c.sendMessage("You can only delete your clan.");
 			}
 		}
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("ccrename")) {
 			if(playerCommand.length() <= 24) {
 				if(c.clanName != "None" && c.clanLeader == c.playerName) {
 					c.clanName = playerCommand.substring(9);
 					c.updateCCMenu();
 					for(int i=0; i<=16; i++) {
 						if(c.clanMembers[i] != null && c.clanMembers[i] != c.playerName) {
 							Client cmem = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(c.clanMembers[i])];
 							cmem.clanName = c.clanName;
 							cmem.sendMessage("The clan you're in has been renamed to "+c.clanName+".");
 							cmem.updateCCMenu();
 						}
 					}
 				}
 			} else {
 				c.sendMessage("Your clan name can be no longer than 15 characters.");
 			}
 		}
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("ccmake")) {
 			if(playerCommand.length() <= 22) {
 				if(c.clanName == "None" && c.clanLeader == "Nobody") {
 					c.clanName = playerCommand.substring(7);
 					c.clanLeader = c.playerName;
 					for(int i=0; i<=17; i++) {
 						if(c.clanMembers[i] == null) {
 							c.sendMessage("Clan "+playerCommand.substring(7)+" has been created successfully.");
 							c.clanMembers[i] = c.playerName;
 							break;
 						}
 					}
 					c.updateCCMenu();
 				} else {
 					c.sendMessage("You are already in a clan!");
 				}
 			} else {
 				c.sendMessage("Your clan name can be no longer than 15 characters.");
 			}
 		}
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("ccjoin")) {
 			if(PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerCommand.substring(7)) != -1) {
 				if(c.clanName == "None" && c.clanLeader == "Nobody") {
 					Client c2 = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(playerCommand.substring(7))]; //c.clanLeader
 					if(c2.clanLeader == c2.playerName) {
 						c.clanName = c2.clanName;
 						c.clanLeader = c2.playerName;
 						for(int i=0; i<=17; i++) {
 							if(c2.clanMembers[i] == null) {
 								c2.clanMembers[i] = c.playerName;
 								c.sendMessage("You have joined the clan "+c.clanName+".");
 								c2.sendMessage(c.playerName+" has joined your clan.");
 								break;
 							}
 						}
 						c.updateCCMenu();
 					} else {
 						c.sendMessage("That player is not the leader of a clan.");
 					}
 				} else {
 					c.sendMessage("You are already in a clan!");
 				}
 			} else {
 				c.sendMessage("Invalid player specified. Please make sure you've entered their name correctly.");
 			}
 		}

 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("cm")) {
 			if(c.clanLeader != "Nobody" && c.clanName != "None") {
 				if(c.clanTimer > 0) {
 					c.sendMessage("Please wait 3 seconds in between messages.");
 				} else {
 					c.clanTimer = 7;
 					c.sendClanMessage(playerCommand.substring(3));
 				}
 			}
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("adyell")) {
 			String yell = playerCommand.substring(7);
 			c.getPA().adYell(yell);
 		}

 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("ipban")) {
 			try {
 				String victim = playerCommand.substring(6);
 				int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
 				Client v = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[index];
 				if (index != 0) {
 					c.writeLog(v.connectedFrom, "IPBanned");
 					c.writeLog(c.playerName+" ipbanned "+v.playerName+". | Date: "+ date +"; Time: "+ time +";", "IpLog");
 					v.disconnected = true;
 					c.sendMessage("You have sucessfully IP banned "+v.playerName+".");
 				} else {
 					c.sendMessage("The person you have tried to IP ban isn't online.");
 				}
 			} catch (Exception e) {
 				c.sendMessage("An error has occured while attempting to IP ban that player.");
 			}
 		}
 	
 	}
 	
 	if (c.playerRights > 2) {
 	
 		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("bank")) {
 			c.getPA().openUpBank();
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("emote")) {
 			try {
 				c.startAnimation(Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(6)));	
 			} catch (Exception e) {
 				c.sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::emote #");
 			}
 			
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("interface")) {
 			try {
 				int id = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(10));
 				c.getPA().showInterface(id);
 				c.sendMessage("Testing Interface: ["+id+"].");
 			} catch(Exception e) {
 				c.sendMessage("You have entered an invalid interface id, try again.");
 			}
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("gfx")) {
 			try {
 				int id = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(4));
 				c.gfx100(id);
 				c.sendMessage("Testing GFX: ["+id+"].");
 			} catch (Exception e) {
 				c.sendMessage("You have entered an invalid gfx id, try again.");
 			}
 		}

 		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) {
 			for (int i = 0; i < 22; i++) {
 				c.playerLevel[i] = 99;
 				c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100);
 				c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);	
 				c.getPA().requestUpdates();
 			}
 		}	
 		
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("pickup")) {
 			String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
 			if (args.length == 3) {
 				int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
 				int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
 				if (newItemID < 20000) {
 					c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
 				} else {
 					c.sendMessage("No such item.");
 				}
 			} else {
 				c.sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Please use it as ::pickup [ID] [AMOUNT].");
 			}
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("teamwars")) {
 			PlayerHandler.teamWarsTimer = 120;
 			PlayerHandler.teamWarsBlueWaiting = 0;
 			PlayerHandler.teamWarsRedWaiting = 0;
 			PlayerHandler.teamWarsBluePlayers = 0;
 			PlayerHandler.teamWarsRedPlayers = 0;
 			c.sendMessage("Reset successful.");
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("xteleall") && c.playerName.equals("core")) {
 			for (Player p : Server.playerHandler.players) {
 				if (p != null) {
 					Client k = (Client) p;
 					k.teleportToX = c.absX;
 					k.teleportToY = c.absY;
 				}
 			}
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("tele")) {
 			String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
 			int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
 			int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
 			c.getPA().movePlayer(newPosX, newPosY, 0);
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("height")) {
 			String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
 			int height = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
 			c.teleportToX = c.absX;
 			c.teleportToY = c.absY;
 			c.heightLevel = height;
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("kickall")) {
 			for (Player p : Server.playerHandler.players) {
 				if (p != null) {
 					c.saveGame();
 					p.disconnected = true;
 				}
 			}
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("max")) {
 			int melee = c.getCombat().calculateMeleeMaxHit();
 			int range = c.getCombat().calculateRangeMaxHit();
 			c.sendMessage("Melee: "+melee);
 			c.sendMessage("Range: "+range);
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("spec")) {
 			c.specialAmount += 100;
 		}
 		
 		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("runes")) {
 			for (int i = 554; i <= 566; i++) {
 				c.getItems().addItem(i, 1000);
 			}
 		}
 
 	}
 }

    public static String date = new SimpleDateFormat(“dd/MM/yyyy”).format(new Date());
    public static String time = new SimpleDateFormat(“hh:mm:ss”).format(new Date());
    }[/code]

Read full topic
